context: By 2015, Motorola Solutions was well-established as an independent company focused on public safety and enterprise security. The company was actively acquiring businesses to strengthen its position, including Emergency CallWorks (February 2015) for NG9-1-1 call-taking software and PublicEngines (April 2015) for crime analysis and data analytics.

competitors.name: Cisco Systems
competitors.notes: Competitor in telecommunications equipment and enterprise communications

competitors.name: Ericsson
competitors.notes: Competitor in telecommunications equipment and critical communications

competitors.name: Nokia
competitors.notes: Competitor in telecommunications equipment and public safety networks

competitors.name: Zebra Technologies
competitors.notes: Competitor after acquiring Motorola's Enterprise business in 2014
